name: Emotions: Search For Humanity
overview:
In this game you play a character called Henky Penky who is a rather plain sort of guy. One morning, he wakes up, looks in the mirror, and decides to do something about his problem. His search for emotions leads him towards great danger, mortal combat, bizarre monsters, weird puzzles and stacks of midgets.

Along your travels, you come across many weird and wonderful things — spiky haired and fire breathing monsters, chainsaws and guns which you can use as weapons to defend yourself, and sticks of dynamite to blow your way through the obstructing walls.
